Item.Text: Gaining Power Cards: Choose Minor or Major Power, draw 4 cards, keep one in hand, discard the rest. If a Major Power, forget one of your Power Cards (which can be the Major Power you just chose)
Anytime you meet the current victory condition
Too Much Blight: If the last Blight comes off the Blight Card, follow the instructions there
A Spirit is Destroyed: If any Spirit has no Presence left on the island
Time Runs Out: If you need to draw an Invader Card (to Explore), but the Invader Deck is empty
